message: Let's start fair, I'll take the bigger share but you get something too.
My turn! How about this split?  You're losing value fast, so it's in your best interest to take a reasonable deal.
Okay, I'll counter your offer, but I need more.  We can both get a decent amount if we agree now.
This is getting ridiculous.  Take this deal before inflation eats away any chance of a good deal for you!
